wikibaseschema-desc: Store and discuss schemas for Wikibase entities
wikibaseschema-newschema-copyright: By clicking "$1", you agree to the [[$2|terms of use]], and you irrevocably agree to release your contribution under the $3.
wikibaseschema-anonymouseditwarning: Warning: You are not logged in. Your IP address will be recorded in the edit history of this Schema.
wikibaseschema-label-edit-placeholder: The label for the Schema in English
wikibaseschema-description-edit-placehol: The description for the Schema in English
wikibaseschema-aliases-edit-placeholder: Alternative labels for the Schema in English
wikibaseschema-error-schemadeleted: The schema you tried to edit doesn't exist. Maybe it was deleted?
